page.title: 02ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: {Entertainment_}The area has{no major {entertainment facilities.}There are no cinemas,theatres,large sports centres, stately homes etc.. However,a more {localised network of clubs, sports, {and other activities}exists to provide leisure time diversions for the population. {Recreation_}Open spaces, parks and playing fields within the the area are used for various sports.{Rugby}is played at{Cleeve Rugby Club}which is situated near to the Bromley Heath Road.{Football}pitches can be found at {King George's Field, Downend, Hambrook {Common, Henfield Sports Field and {Blackhorse Playing Field.}An{archery club uses the open land of the rugby club grounds. In the summer,{cricket is popular. The team that utilises Hambrook Common often attracts spectators as parking is convenient.
